main event: A military report of a UFO sighting near Indianapolis confirmed by visual and radar contact.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3 to 5 seconds,No sound was heard during the sighting,The UFO made a short dash toward Indianapolis before returning,No physical evidence was collected,The sighting was related to Project Blue Book.
witness description: L/Cpl DeLoughary of the 17th Bomb Wing reported the sighting.
